name: AppNotch
tag_list: mobile, app, web, cms, appbuilder, appmaker, android, ios, iphone, ipad, free
overview:
An online service that lets you build feature rich html5 and jquery based mobile sites, android and iphone apps in under 4 steps.

A super fast & addictively easy way to build Apps in 2 steps. Takes less than 30 seconds.

Nothing to Download or Install. No Programming Required. Just Drag & Drop.

Its 100% Free.

We offer new templates for users to pick and choose from to help get started with design and layout ideas.
